name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses 0RB3025 L0205 58
description: Sunglasses by Ray-Ban - Coloured teardrop lenses - Full rimmed metal frames - Soft plastic nose pads - Slim temples
additionalInfo: 100% Metal 100% Plastic Lens UV 100 Protection SIZE & FIT Lens Size: 5.8cm/2.3"

brand.name: Ray-Ban
brand.description: An iconic Ray-Ban style, the Aviator was originally designed in 1937 for the U.S. military fighter pilots. With a cult celebrity following, the Aviator is famed for its signature metal frame and teardrop lenses, in a selection of finishes and metals, including the ultra-lightweight and durable carbon fibre addition.

careInfo: To maintain appearance we recommend wiping any marks with a soft cloth
